room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Spell" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: We had a blast! Carlos was amazing and gave us just the right amount of tips to keep us on track. Great way to spend an afternoon.

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Spell" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: This was a blast! My kids and I did a great job and got pretty far. Unfortunately we didn't escape. Ben and Jackson were awesome and really helpful! Love this place definitely coming back.

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Spell" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: We had a great time as a group and i would recommend this activity to anyone! Zack helped us out and he was fantastic as well!

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Spell" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: Very original escape room! We played Spellbound and had lots of fun :) The set design was on point and the puzzles were different and challenging, great for newbies and experienced enthusiasts alike!

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Spell" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: This was our first experience and had a wonderful time in Spellbound. Jackson was very good with his hints and we came very close to escaping. Next time...

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Spell" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: I loved the Spellbound room, I went with my boyfriend this past Saturday and it was kinda hard and we did not make it out in time but it was fun... I am definitely coming back and trying the other rooms and telling my family and friends! Sarah is a sweetheart!
